Posts.HTML:
Merry Christmas Axeuk!

Ever since I joined this wonderful .txt community I have had nothing but an extremely fun time. I have made friends and the odd enemy, argued with them, laughed alongside them, encouraged and helped them, and sent a sh!tload of virtual hugs. Thus, to show my gratitude to this awesome gathering of kind-hearted manchildren, I hereby:

ELF MYSELF! DISCO STYLE

Please follow my example and Elf Yourself too!

To get the URL for your Elf easily, after making it and registering (no need to verify) go to the Email / Embed tab, then Embed. Next copy the Embed Code. There will be a section that says: data=http://aka.zero.jibjab.com/client/zero/ClientZero_EmbedViewer.swf?external_make_id=<your dances id>&service=sendables.jibjab.com&partnerID=ElfYourself. This is the url you want!
